thread.title: iPhone 6s hands-on video review: First impressions of Apple's latest smartphone
thread.title_full: iPhone 6s hands-on video review: First impressions of Apple's latest smartphone

author: Jasper Hamill
title: iPhone 6s hands-on video review: First impressions of Apple's latest smartphone
text:
Tech fans have already started queueing up outside Apple stores around the world, desperate to get their hands on a brand new iPhone 6s . 
But here at Mirror Online, we've already rubbed our greedy mitts all over the latest mobile phone. 
In the video above, tech columnist Kevin Lynch gets his very first look at the new gadget. 
It might look similar to the old model (and the one before that, to be fair) but lurking within this familiar casing are cool features like 3D touch, which allows users to control the phone by applying pressure to the screen, and all manner of other goodies. 
Of course, tomorrow you might actually be able to get your hands on an iPhone 6s, if you're willing to brave the madness of release day. 
We'll be down on the Apple frontline first thing in the morning, reporting from the very front of the line, and will have all the latest news throughout the day. Poll loading â€¦
